summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2060 for the improvement of West Harrison Street, from Queen Anne Avenue to Elliott Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by replanking the same with a plank roadway sixteen (16) feet in width; under Ordinance No. 20710, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
